name: Nathan
room_type: Club Double or Twin Room with Lounge Access
text: Everything was absolutely perfect from the time of check-in until check-out. All the staff were incredibly friendly and it felt like home even though it was only for 1 night. Perfect location, exceptional breakfast and the business lounge with drinks and snacks is perfect.
